Chennai team is an established cricket group based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. Established in 2008, the group plays domestic matches in Chennai at the M. A. Chidambaram Stadium.

The group took a two-year break from Indian T20 League beginning July 2015. They won the title in their comeback season of 2018 under the coaching of Stephen Fleming and captaincy of Mahendra Singh Dhoni.

They are the current defending champions, having won the 2021 match season.

The Hyderabad team is an established cricket group based in Hyderabad, Telangana. The SUN Group’s Kalanithi Maran claims ownership of the establishment. Kane Williamson is the team’s captain, and Trevor Bayliss is the coach.

The Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium in Hyderabad, which has a capacity of 55,000 spectators, is their principal home ground. In 2013, the club made their maiden participation in the match, reaching the playoffs and finishing fourth.

Chennai vs Hyderabad: Head-To-Head Record

Both the teams have faced each other 16 times in the Indian Cricket League. The Hyderabad side has won 4 times, whereas the Chennai side has won 12 times.

Know More About Chennai and Hyderabad Teams in Indian T20 Cricket League

The Hyderabad squad is a well-known cricket squad situated in Hyderabad, Telangana.  The captain is Kane Williamson, while the coach is Trevor Bayliss.

The Chennai team is a well-known cricket franchise based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. The team, which was founded in 2008, plays domestic matches at the M. A. Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai.

Top Performers in Batting – Chennai VS Hyderabad Matches

The top scorers in Chennai vs Hyderabad matches are:[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_4_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#FC575E” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Most Runs

Suresh Raina, has swung the bat for both teams and has scored the most runs (415) in the match. Shikhar Dhawan (Hyderabad): 353 runs and MS Dhoni (Chennai): 331 runs are in 2nd and 3rd places, respectively.

Highest Scores

● Suresh Raina (Chennai): 415 runs
● Shikhar Dhawan (Hyderabad): 353 runs
● MS Dhoni (Chennai): 331 runs [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Roster” _builder_version=”4.14.5″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#121a25″ background_color_gradient_end=”#002e54″ background_image=”http://www.my11circle.com/fantasy-sports/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/cricket-icon-04.png” background_size=”contain” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_3_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#fc575e” header_3_font_size=”28px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Top Performers in Bowling – Chennai vs Hyderabad Matches

The bowlers with the most number of wickets and outstanding economy in Chennai vs Hyderabad are:[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Coda||||||||” text_text_color=”#dddddd” text_font_size=”16px” header_4_font=”Nova Flat||||||||” header_4_text_color=”#FC575E” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.8em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Most Wicket

● Deepak Chahar (Chennai): 3/15
● Rashid Khan (Hyderabad): 2/17
● T Natarajan (Hyderabad): 2/43

Best Bowling

Deepak Chahar (Chennai): 3/15 has the best bowling figures for the team, whereas Rashid Khan (Hyderabad): 2/17 has the best bowling figures for the other team.

Tips For Picking Your Fantasy Team

  • Examine the weather prediction as well as the pitch report
    Before choosing the team’s players, get a sense of how the pitch has behaved in the past one or two matches. The basic concept of pitches is that a bouncy wicket is a bowler’s dream, whereas a flat pitch will aid in scoring more runs. Then, always select the starting eleven after thoroughly knowing about the playing surface and making informed selections.
  • Examine the players’ most recent performance
    Don’t only look for big personalities when picking a player. Examine the player’s recent performance to get a good picture of how they will perform. Opting for a big brand would just deduct the maximum credit points from your account, possibly leaving you with nothing.
  • Selecting an effective captain and vice-captain
    The captain and vice-captain of the fantasy squad are one of the most crucial components of your team and can set your team apart from opponents. The chosen captain receives 2x points, while the vice-captain receives 1.5x points. Therefore, choosing an all-rounder for team captain could be the best plan.
  • The teams’ most recent news and announcements
    Keep an eye out for all of the team’s announcements. Even a coach’s replacement affects the squad’s playing XI.
  • Keeping up with the players’ latest news
    Injury reports on players are critical in selecting the best starting lineup. Similarly, if a player’s batting position changes, one must be aware of it, as selecting the best top-order batsmen on your side is crucial to winning big. In a fantasy cricket team, 60 percent of the players should be top-order batsmen.
  • Choosing the right batsmen, bowlers, wicketkeepers, and fielders
    Choosing at least one participant from each category is essential. Upper batsmen should not have to be professional batsmen; they could be any person who strikes at the leadoff spot.
